reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: The evidence provided does not establish a normative constraint between maxMIMO-Layers and any other field within the same IE. The evidence is definitional and pertains to configuration hierarchy rather than a direct field relationship.

meta.evidence: Indicates the maximum number of MIMO layers to be used for PDSCH in this DL BWP. If not configured, the UE uses the maxMIMO-Layers configuration in IE PDSCHServingCellConfig of the serving cell to which this BWP belongs, when the UE operates in this BWP. The value of maxMIMO-Layers for a DL BWP shall be smaller than or equal to the value of maxMIMO-Layers configured in IE PDSCH-ServingCellConfig of the serving cell to which this BWP belongs.

full_api_response.notes: The evidence provided does not establish a normative constraint between maxMIMO-Layers and any other field within the same IE. The evidence is definitional and pertains to configuration hierarchy rather than a direct field relationship.
